ResearchProjectDef.label: Archotech Fundamentals
ResearchProjectDef.description: Develop a way of connecting an AI to an archotech device, allowing it to help decipher archotech technology.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText: Archotech fragments, some believe them to be fragments of a once-functional archotech device, some believe them to be one’s connection to an archotech being taking physical form, but that’s not important right now.\n\nMechanoids have been known to incorporate archotech technology into their arsenal, perhaps, if asked nicely, they could share some of it.
